member.name: T:GroupDocs.Signature.Engine.ViewingEngine
member.summary: Contains methods for viewing documents in Web UI.

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Signature.Engine.ViewingEngine.GetPageDescriptions(System.String)
member.summary: Gets information about document pages: their sizes, maximum page height, the width of a page with the maximum height.
member.param: The file unique identifier, full path for local storage e.g. c:\\storage\\document.txt, relative path e.g document.txt, url e.g. http://site.com/document.txt.
member.returns: An object of the DocumentDescription class

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Signature.Engine.ViewingEngine.GetDocumentPageImage(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an image of a specified page.
member.param: The file unique identifier, full path for local storage e.g. c:\\storage\\document.txt, relative path e.g document.txt, url e.g. http://site.com/document.txt.
The number of a page to get image for.
member.returns: An array of bytes representng the output image.

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Signature.Engine.ViewingEngine.GetPageSize(System.String,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,GroupDocs.Signature.Domain.PositionInCellsDocument)
member.summary: Gets the size of a page of a document.
member.param: The file unique identifier, full path for local storage e.g. c:\\storage\\document.txt, relative path e.g document.txt, url e.g. http://site.com/document.txt.
The X coordinate of a signature for Cells files.
The Y coordinate of a signature for Cells files.
The row and column number of the nearest to the signature cell are returned in this object for Cells files.
member.returns: The size of a specified page for file types excluding Cells.

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Signature.Handler.SignatureHandler.GetDocumentPageImage(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an image of a specified page.
member.param: The file unique identifier, full path for local storage e.g. c:\\storage\\document.txt, relative path e.g document.txt, url e.g. http://site.com/document.txt.
The number of a page to get image for.
member.returns: An array of bytes representng the output image.

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Signature.Handler.SignatureHandler.GetPageSize(System.String,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,GroupDocs.Signature.Domain.PositionInCellsDocument)
member.summary: Gets the size of a page of a document.
member.param: The file unique identifier, full path for local storage e.g. c:\\storage\\document.txt, relative path e.g document.txt, url e.g. http://site.com/document.txt.
The X coordinate of a signature for Cells files.
The Y coordinate of a signature for Cells files.
The row and column number of the nearest to the signature cell are returned in this object for Cells files.
member.returns: The size of a specified page for file types excluding Cells.
